examples: He set his e-mail message's priority to high.

definitions.definition: A goal of a person or an organisation.
examples: She needs to get her priorities straight and stop playing games.

definitions.definition: The quality of being earlier or coming first compared to another thing; the state of being prior .
examples: In bankruptcy law, a business' debt to its employees has priority over its debt to a landlord, so the employees must be paid first.

definitions.definition: A superior claim to use by virtue of being validly published at an earlier date.
Right of way ; The right to pass (an intersection) before other road users.

The quality of being earlier or coming first compared to another thing; the state of being prior .
